name: Looking up the definition of '<test>'

testSteps.description: Example: {word=banana, definition=An elongated curved tropical fruit that grows in bunches and has a creamy flesh and a smooth skin.}

children.description: Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
When the user looks up the definition of the word '<test>'
Then they should see the definition '<definition>'
Should see definition: An elongated curved tropical fruit that grows in bunches and has a creamy flesh and a smooth skin.
Given the user is on the Wikionary home page
When the user looks up the definition of the word '<test>'
Then they should see the definition '<definition>'
Should see definition: A yellowish citrus fruit.

userStory.narrative:
In order to talk better
As a n English student
I want to look up word definitions
